name: Melt into trust
description: 'My hands they seek the end of afternoon. My hands believe and move over you ....... Tonight with the sea and the rhythm there. The waves and the wind, the night is black. Tonight with the scent of your long blond hair, spread out like your breath across my back. Your hands they move like waves over me beneath the moon tonight near the sea...' Iron and Wine ////// Derivative GIf from a poster I made in mid-may // See the original at IG @boryaXYZ
